title: Weekend Special Offer
description: Enjoy 25% off on mountain bikes this weekend. Hit the trails in style and save big!

title: Ride More, Pay Less
description: Book for 3 days or longer and save 20% on your rental. More days, more savings!

title: New Customer Offer
description: First-time renters can enjoy 15% off their initial rental. Welcome to the ride!

title: Electric Bike Discount
description: Get 30% off on electric bike rentals this month. Make your rides smooth and easy!

title: Family Ride Deal
description: Book for 4 family members and get 1 bike free. Perfect for family adventures!

title: Evening Rider Special
description: Get 10% off for bike rentals after 5 PM. Evening rides just got more affordable!
